bills.title: Generally revise laws related to the administration of TRS
Revise law to change supervision of veterans' affairs division administrator
Reinstating former employer contributions for JRS, HPORS, SRS, GWPORS
Allow for automatic return of certain unclaimed property
Allow sharing of tax records for securities and insurance fraud investigations
Revise the petroleum storage tank cleanup eligibility requirements
Generally revise decennial veteran study laws
Revise laws relating to pharmacies, pharmacy benefit managers, and other entities
